title: 82/84/EEC: Commission Decision of 23 December 1981 establishing that the apparatus described as 'Quanta Ray pulsed dye laser, model PDL-1, and Nd : YAG laboratory laser system, model DCR-1A' may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 23 December 1981
establishing that the apparatus described as 'Quanta Ray pulsed dye laser, model PDL-1, and Nd: YAG laboratory laser system, model DCR-1A' may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties
(82/84/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The apparatus described as 'Quanta Ray pulsed dye laser, model PDL-1, and Nd: YAG laboratory laser system, model DCR-1A', which is the subject of an application by the Federal Republic of Germany of 19 June 1981, may not be imported free of Common Customs Tariff duties.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 23 December 1981.
For the Commission
Karl-Heinz NARJES
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 184, 15. 7. 1975, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 134, 31. 5. 1979, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 318, 13. 12. 1979, p. 32.
